title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: LUL, YES TY RIOT JUST WHAT WE WANTED 15 DAYS OF PORO KING LMAO. You guys really don't listen to the community XD
bring out black market brawlers pls :){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

No we don't want to play these shitty game modes just urf. 
For the love of god bring me urf.
what happen to snowdown showdown. i really loved that
damn i want to play urf so badly
why i can`t play one for all ?? can you fix it for me. Name Point of God . Thks
you can only play it on the legacy client
i wish they brought back snowdown showdown for the All Stars and snowdown
Seriously, poro king sucks, I played Aram yesterday, two rounds all teamed up with that freaking bot... never use ult, just walks up and stands there and then just dies...
yay glad you are keeping with the snowdown tradition, but can you do what you do every other year and have poro king permanent all week. You did it for doom bots can you do it for this too please.

This is stupid they said the Gamemode Que would be all random yet they keep fucking with the Que.  Is it just me or has URF All Random been up there 2 times now only to be changed into another Gamemode?
You spelt queue wrong whilst you called Riot stupid and its just you.
Lel, more poro king. I'd wish we had a double weekend of urf you know, or at least the arurf.
Y can't riot add all random urf into the rotation
rotating game mode... nah more like Repeating game modes that aren't half a good as riot think. this year has been a waste on hope.
